title: Google\Cloud\CertificateManager\V1\ListDnsAuthorizationsRequest
name: ListDnsAuthorizationsRequest
description:
Request for the ListDnsAuthorizations method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.certificatemanager.v1.ListDnsAuthorizationsRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The project and location from which the dns authorizations should be listed, specified in the format projects/*/locations/*.

params.name: data.page_size
params.description: Maximum number of dns authorizations to return per call.

params.name: data.page_token
params.description: The value returned by the last ListDnsAuthorizationsResponse. Indicates that this is a continuation of a prior ListDnsAuthorizations call, and that the system should return the next page of data.

params.name: data.filter
params.description: Filter expression to restrict the Dns Authorizations returned.

params.name: data.order_by
params.description: A list of Dns Authorization field names used to specify the order of the returned results. The default sorting order is ascending. To specify descending order for a field, add a suffix " desc".
